data.caption: Clarification sought from Jindal Poly Films Ltd

data.caption: Jindal Poly Films Ltd reply to clairification sought by the Exchange
data.news_body:
Wth reference to the media report appearing on https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/industry/indl-goods/svs/chem-/-fertilisers/nclt-allows-class-action-lawsuit-against-jindal-poly-films/articleshow/127933640.cms (Source: https:// economictimes.indiatimes.com) dated February 05 2026 titled "NCLT allows Rs. 2500-crore class action lawsuit against Jindal Poly Films".

Jindal Poly Films Ltd response is attached.
